Watch: Auckland family given four minutes to grab groceries at Pak’nSave supermarket https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-auckland-family-given-four-minutes-to-grab-groceries-at-paknsave-supermarket/FMEOQ4IWB5DF3DPYFGZHK7XPCM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watch-auckland-family-given-four-minutes-to-grab-groceries-at-paknsave-supermarket/FMEOQ4IWB5DF3DPYFGZHK7XPCM/ The lucky family scored nearly $1400 worth of groceries. Sun, 19 Nov 2023 07:44:06 +0000 The trolley grab winner's family complete a shop at the Westgate Pak'n'Save to celebrate the store's ninth anniversary, accumulating $1397.189 of groceries.
